did.abstract: Beverly Kaplan graduated in 1948 from the New York University School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance. The Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers consist of materials created and collected while Kaplan was a student at the School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance from 1944 to 1948. The collection includes photographs of Kaplan with her fellow classmates, a diploma, report cards, an engraved fountain pen and mechanical pencil with her name, a class yearbook, and a New York University alumna card.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers consist of materials created and collected while Kaplan was a student at the New York University School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance from 1944 to 1948. The collection includes photographs of Kaplan with her fellow classmates, a diploma, report cards, an engraved fountain pen and mechanical pencil with her name, a class yearbook, and a New York University alumna card.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Beverly Kaplan graduated in 1948 from New York University the School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance. Kaplan passed away in February 2017.
